犳字的基本解释

犳
zhuó
古书上说的一种兽，像豹，没有花纹。

犳
bào
古同“豹”。

犳字的汉语字典释义

[①]［zhuó］
［《廣韻》之若切，入藥，章。］
传说中的动物名。

犳字的康熙字典解释

【巳集下】【犬字部】　犳； 康熙笔画：7； 页码：页706第15
【廣韻】之若切【集韻】職略切，?音灼。【玉篇】獸豹文。【山海經】?陽之山，其獸多犀兕虎犳。【註】郭璞曰：犳音之藥反。字海云：犳，皮有虎文。【又】嬴母之山，其神狀如人而犳尾。【集韻】犳，獸名，出隄山，狀如豹而無文。◎按山海經西山經，隄山有狕。本作狕，郭璞音幺。另詳狕字註。集韻引以訓犳，誤。

犳字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体韩国明朝体
犳字的起名意思

暂无。

Basic explanation of words
F
zhuó
A kind of beast mentioned in ancient books, like a leopard, has no patterns.
F
bào
Gu Tong "Leopard".

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［zhuó］
["Guang Yun" is cut, used as medicine, chapter. ]
The legendary animal name.

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Part Two] [Dog Character Department] 　犳; Kangxi strokes: 7; Page number: page 706 15
[Guang Yun] If cut [Ji Yun] slightly cut,? Yin Zhuo. [Jade articles] Beast and leopard text. [Shanhaijing]? Yangzhishan, its beasts are many rhinoceros and tigers. [Note] Guo Pu said: Fayin is the antidote to medicine. The word Haiyun: 犳, the skin has tiger text. [Also] Yingmu's mountain, its deity looks like a human but has a tail. 【Ji Yun】Fan, the name of the animal, out of the embankment, looks like a leopard without writing. ◎According to the mountain and sea through the west mountain, the embankment has a mountain. This work is 狕, Guo Puyin Yao. Another detailed note of the words. The rhyme is quoted as a training, which is wrong.
